code:
stateDiagram-v2
    %% L++ State Diagram: TLAPS Seal Certifier
    [*] --> idle
    idle --> loading : CERTIFY
    loading --> auditing : AUTO [error is None]
    auditing --> generating_tla : AUTO [blueprint is not None && error is None]
    generating_tla --> tlc_verifying : AUTO [trinityAudit is not None an... && flangeAudit is not None and... && error is None]
    tlc_verifying --> tlc_verified : AUTO [tlaSpec is not None && error is None]
    tlc_verified --> tlaps_proving : PROVE [tlcResult is not None and t...]
    tlaps_proving --> certified : AUTO [error is None]
    tlc_verified --> certified : SEAL_TLC [tlcResult is not None and t...]
    auditing --> rejected : AUTO [error is not None]
    tlc_verifying --> rejected : AUTO [error is not None]
    tlaps_proving --> rejected : AUTO [error is not None]
    loading --> idle : RESET
    auditing --> idle : RESET
    generating_tla --> idle : RESET
    rejected --> idle : RESET
    tlc_verifying --> idle : RESET
    tlc_verified --> idle : RESET
    certified --> idle : RESET
    tlaps_proving --> idle : RESET
    certified --> certified : VIEW [tlapsResult is not None and...]
    rejected --> [*]
    certified --> [*]

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 * 和 error is None 的逻辑。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 *处理。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 '*处理'，对吧？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 blueprint is not None && error is None 和 trinityAudit is not None an... && flangeAudit is not None and... && error is None 的分支。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'blueprint is not None && error is None 和 trinityAudit is not None an... && flangeAudit is not None and... && error is None'，对吧？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 tlaSpec is not None && error is None 和 tlcResult is not None and t... 的逻辑。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'tlaSpec is not None && error is None 和 tlcResult is not None and t...'，你看看合适吗？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 error is None 和 tlcResult is not None and t... 这一块。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'error is None 和 tlcResult is not None and t...'。
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 error is not None 和 error is not None 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'error is not None 和 error is not None'，你看看合适吗？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 error is not None 和 tlapsResult is not None and...。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'error is not None 和 tlapsResult is not None and...'，对吧？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]

extra.repo_description: L++ is not a programming language. It is a language-agnostic Logic Frame designed to execute business processes defined in purely symbolic, declarative blueprints.
